mobile.name: dog cooshee
mobile.long_descr: A rather large dog is here, wandering the valley.
mobile.description:
A beast is the size of the largest common dog.  It has a greenish coat with
brown spots.  Its shape, along with its colors, make this cooshee almost
undetectable as it moves.

mobile.name: elf valley
mobile.long_descr: A valley elf wanders here, cautious of your intrusion.
mobile.description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and agile.  You see
hatred in his eyes, and you try to avoid his stare.  His tense body looks ready
to spring upon you, like a mountain lion stalking its prey.  He sees you
noticing him, and quietly disappears.

mobile.name: elf valley
mobile.long_descr: A female valley elf wanders here, skirting between the tall grasses.
mobile.description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile.
She glares at you, then quickly disappears before you see more of her.

mobile.name: elf sentry valley
mobile.long_descr: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!
mobile.description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile.
He glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.

mobile.name: elf sentry valley
mobile.long_descr: A valley elf sentry stands here, then noticing you, attacks quickly!
mobile.description:
This elf is almost as tall as you are, but much slimmer and more agile.
She glares at your intrusion and attacks with menace.

mobile.name: elf scout valley
mobile.long_descr: A valley elf scout wanders the valley, searching for intruders like you!
mobile.description: The elf notices your intrusion and attacks with determination.

mobile.name: elf valley
mobile.long_descr: A valley elf is here, doing her duties.
mobile.description:
She is currently doing some menial chores, and ignores your intrusion except
when you are in her way.

mobile.name: elf elder valley
mobile.long_descr:
A valley elf elder is here, studying.  He notices you.
A valley elf elder shouts 'You have intruded wrongly.  Be prepared to die!'
mobile.description:
This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age.  He looks
quite potent, though.

mobile.name: elf elder valley
mobile.long_descr:
A valley elf elder is here, studying.  She notices you.
A valley elf elder says 'Your arrogance will be your end, human.'
mobile.description:
This elf looks quite old, probably twenty or more times your age.  She looks
quite potent, though.

mobile.name: pyrohydra pyro hydra
mobile.long_descr: A big beast with many heads, each breathing fire, stares at you with malice.
mobile.description:
This big beast looks like a small red dragon, but has many more heads than a
regular dragon, too.  It doesn't look happy.

mobile.name: hermit man old
mobile.long_descr: An old hermit sits here, smoking a pipe.

mobile.name: talemon wizard mage
mobile.long_descr: An old mage busies himself with some chemicals.
mobile.description: Talemon looks harmless, but the fireballs he throws at you don't.

mobile.name: guardian daemon
mobile.long_descr: A huge guardian daemon is here, watching the treasure.
mobile.description:
This daemon is unhappy with its summoned job, and is willing to take out it's
anger at you!

mobile.name: wolf
mobile.long_descr: A wolf is here, looking for small prey.
mobile.description: The wolf is covered with brown hair.  It looks at you with fright.

mobile.name: antelope
mobile.long_descr: An antelope is here, peacefully munching on grass.
mobile.description:
With horns and spots over coarse, brown hair, this beast is the spit and
image of ... an antelope.
